title: 02/11/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/11/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show we were joined by a Super Bowl Winner, a Dayton 500 winner, and a voice that may sound familiar. Shaq Barrett of the Bucs joins us to look back on their Super Bowl winning season. Denny Hamlin calls in ahead of the Dayton 500. And Alan Roach, the PA announcer for the Super Bowl, introduces the Dan Patrick Show starting 5

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
